title: Revenue of the global eSports market 2012 to 2022
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2012 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and lastly roughly increasing from 2019 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2022.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 1790.0 was reached at Year 2022
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 130.0 was reported at Year 2012
